title: Implement Whisper ASR Container Integration
body:
## Description
Implement embedded Whisper ASR support for automatic subtitle generation from media files.

## Requirements
- Docker container management for Whisper service
- API integration with OpenAI Whisper
- Fallback to external API if container unavailable
- Progress tracking for transcription jobs
- WebSocket updates for real-time progress

## Technical Details
- Create `pkg/transcriber/whisper_container.go`
- Add Docker client dependency
- Implement container lifecycle management
- Add configuration options for model selection
- Create UI for transcription management

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Whisper container can be started/stopped via UI
- [ ] Media files can be transcribed to subtitles
- [ ] Progress is shown in real-time
- [ ] Multiple language support
- [ ] Configurable model selection (tiny, base, small, medium, large)
